insert.if: INSERT into s_b_dayage_setting_sub ( farm_id , house_id , day_age , set_temp , high_alarm_temp , low_alarm_temp , set_humidity , memo , create_person , create_date , create_time , modify_person , modify_date , modify_time ) values ( #{farmId}, #{houseId}, #{day_age}, #{set_temp}, #{high_alarm_temp}, #{low_alarm_temp}, #{set_humidity}, #{memo}, #{create_person}, #{create_date}, #{create_time}, #{modify_person}, #{modify_date}, #{modify_time} )

INSERT into s_b_dayage_setting_sub ( farm_id , house_id , day_age , high_alarm_negative_pressure , set_humidity , memo , create_person , create_date , create_time , modify_person , modify_date , modify_time ) values ( #{farmId}, #{houseId}, #{day_age}, #{high_alarm_negative_pressure}, #{set_humidity}, #{memo}, #{create_person}, #{create_date}, #{create_time}, #{modify_person}, #{modify_date}, #{modify_time} )

INSERT into s_b_dayage_setting_sub ( farm_id , house_id , day_age , high_alarm_co2 , set_humidity , memo , create_person , create_date , create_time , modify_person , modify_date , modify_time ) values ( #{farmId}, #{houseId}, #{day_age}, #{high_alarm_co2}, #{set_humidity}, #{memo}, #{create_person}, #{create_date}, #{create_time}, #{modify_person}, #{modify_date}, #{modify_time} )

INSERT into s_b_dayage_setting_sub ( farm_id , house_id , day_age , set_water_deprivation , high_water_deprivation , low_water_deprivation , set_humidity , memo , create_person , create_date , create_time , modify_person , modify_date , modify_time ) values ( #{farmId}, #{houseId}, #{day_age}, #{set_water_deprivation}, #{high_alarm_co2}, #{high_water_deprivation}, #{set_humidity}, #{memo}, #{create_person}, #{create_date}, #{create_time}, #{modify_person}, #{modify_date}, #{modify_time} )

mapper.insert: INSERT into s_b_dayage_setting_sub ( farm_id , house_id , day_age , set_temp , high_alarm_temp , low_alarm_temp , set_negative_pressure , high_alarm_negative_pressure , low_alarm_negative_pressure , set_co2 , high_alarm_co2 , low_alarm_co2 , set_water_deprivation , high_water_deprivation , low_water_deprivation , set_humidity , memo , create_person , create_date , create_time , modify_person , modify_date , modify_time ) values ( #{farmId}, #{houseId}, #{day_age}, #{set_temp}, #{high_alarm_temp}, #{low_alarm_temp}, #{set_negative_pressure}, #{high_alarm_negative_pressure}, #{low_alarm_negative_pressure}, #{set_co2}, #{high_alarm_co2}, #{low_alarm_co2}, #{set_water_deprivation}, #{high_water_deprivation}, #{low_water_deprivation}, #{set_humidity}, #{memo}, #{create_person}, #{create_date}, #{create_time}, #{modify_person}, #{modify_date}, #{modify_time} )

INSERT into s_b_dayage_temp_sub ( uid_num, farm_id, house_id, day_age, record_datetime, set_temp, high_alarm_temp, low_alarm_temp, set_humidity, memo, create_person, create_date, create_time, modify_person, modify_date, modify_time, high_alarm_humidity, low_alarm_humidity, super_high_alarm_humidity, super_low_alarm_humidity, super_high_alarm_temp, super_low_alarm_temp, set_negative_pressure, high_alarm_negative_pressure, low_alarm_negative_pressure, super_high_alarm_negative_pressure, super_low_alarm_negative_pressure, set_co2, high_alarm_co2, low_alarm_co2, super_high_alarm_co2, super_low_alarm_co2, set_water_deprivation, high_water_deprivation, low_water_deprivation, super_high_water_deprivation, super_low_water_deprivation ) values ( #{uid_num}, #{farmId}, #{houseId}, #{day_age}, #{record_datetime}, #{set_temp}, #{high_alarm_temp}, #{low_alarm_temp}, #{set_humidity}, #{memo}, #{create_person}, #{create_date}, #{create_time}, #{modify_person}, #{modify_date}, #{modify_time}, #{high_alarm_humidity}, #{low_alarm_humidity}, #{super_high_alarm_humidity}, #{super_low_alarm_humidity}, #{super_high_alarm_temp}, #{super_low_alarm_temp}, #{set_negative_pressure}, #{high_alarm_negative_pressure}, #{low_alarm_negative_pressure}, #{super_high_alarm_negative_pressure}, #{super_low_alarm_negative_pressure}, #{set_co2}, #{high_alarm_co2}, #{low_alarm_co2}, #{super_high_alarm_co2}, #{super_low_alarm_co2}, #{set_water_deprivation}, #{high_water_deprivation}, #{low_water_deprivation}, #{super_high_water_deprivation}, #{super_low_water_deprivation} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_order, remind_method, farm_id, house_id, user_type, user_id, create_time, create_person, modify_person, modify_time, bak1, bak2 FROM s_b_reminder WHERE farm_id = #{farmId} AND house_id = #{houseId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_b_reminder(user_order, remind_method, farm_id, house_id, user_type, user_id, create_time, create_person, modify_person, modify_time )value(#{user_order}, #{remind_method}, #{farmId}, #{houseId}, #{user_type}, #{user_id}, #{create_time}, #{create_person}, #{modify_person}, #{modify_time})
mapper.select: SELECT farm_id, house_id, remind_method, status, create_time, create_person, modify_person, modify_time FROM s_b_remind_switch WHERE farm_id = #{farmId} AND house_id = #{houseId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_b_remind_switch(farm_id, house_id, remind_method, status, create_time, create_person, modify_person, modify_time)value( #{farmId}, #{houseId}, #{remind_method}, #{status}, #{create_time}, #{create_person}, #{modify_person}, #{modify_time})

INSERT INTO s_b_remind_alarmcode( farm_id, house_id, remind_method, alarm_code, create_time, create_person, modify_person, modify_time )value( #{farmId}, #{houseId}, #{remind_method}, #{alarm_code}, #{create_time}, #{create_person}, #{modify_person}, #{modify_time})
mapper.select: SELECT id, farm_id, house_id, remind_method, alarm_code, create_time, create_person, modify_person, modify_time, bak1, bak2 FROM s_b_remind_alarmcode WHERE farm_id = #{farmId} AND house_id = #{houseId} AND alarm_code = #{alarm_code}
SELECT farm_id, remind_method, switch_rele_house, person_rele_house, alarm_rele_house, create_time, bak1, bak2 FROM s_b_remind_setting WHERE farm_id = #{farmId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_b_remind_setting( farm_id, remind_method, switch_rele_house, person_rele_house, alarm_rele_house, create_time)value( #{farmId}, #{remind_method}, #{switch_rele_house}, #{person_rele_house}, #{alarm_rele_house}, #{create_time})
mapper.select: select id, user_code, user_real_name, user_real_name_en, user_password, user_mobile_1, user_mobile_2, user_tel_1, user_tel_2, user_email, user_status, freeze_status, memo_1, memo_2, memo_3, memo_4, create_person, create_date, create_time, modify_person, modify_date, modify_time from s_d_user where user_status =1
SELECT code_type, biz_code, code_name, bak1, bak2, code_desc FROM s_d_code WHERE code_type = #{code_type} ORDER BY biz_code
